testcase.name: REST API Testing with JSON output
testcase.system-out: Given url "http://dummy.restapiexample.com/api/v1/employees" .............. passed When method GET ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * print response .......................................................... passed * match response.status == 'success' ...................................... passed * match response.status == '#string' ...................................... passed * match response.data == '#array' ......................................... passed * match response.data[*].employee_name contains "Sonya Frost" ............. passed
